system_info.name: Frater Achad System
system_info.description: Continuing the Great Work of Charles Stansfeld Jones
system_info.primary_focus: True Will, Individual Pathways, and the Oath of the Abyss

al_31.insight: The word AL (God, Not) equals 31, key to Liber AL
al_31.application: Understanding the formula of the Aeon

inverted_tree.insight: Tree of Life can be read with Kether at the bottom
inverted_tree.application: Seeing divine descent into matter as ascent

achad_221.application: Love is the law, love under will

aeon_of_maat.insight: Following Horus, the Aeon of Ma'at (Truth/Justice)
aeon_of_maat.application: Bringing balance and truth to manifestation

0.name: The Fool
0.meaning: The leap into the Abyss, trust in the universe
0.practice: Daily trust exercises, leap before you look (consciously)

1.name: The Magus
1.practice: Ritual work, invocation, speaking your will

2.name: The High Priestess
2.meaning: The veil between conscious and unconscious

3.name: The Empress
3.meaning: Creative force of the divine feminine

5.name: The Hierophant
5.meaning: The nail connecting heaven and earth

6.name: The Lovers
6.meaning: Union of opposites under True Will
6.practice: Conscious commitment, yoking love to will

7.name: The Chariot
7.practice: Martial practice in service of purpose

8.name: Adjustment
8.practice: Daily balance audits; correct course swiftly

9.name: The Hermit
9.meaning: Interior light, the lamp of prudence
9.practice: Periodic retreats, study, and silent work

10.name: Wheel of Fortune
10.meaning: Cyclical destiny; ride the wheel without attachment
10.practice: Observe cycles; time acts with the Will

11.name: Lust
11.meaning: Ecstasy as fuel for the Great Work
11.practice: Harness passion; consecrate energy to purpose

12.name: The Hanged Man
12.meaning: Surrender of ego; inversion brings insight
12.practice: Reversal meditations; surrender what blocks Will

13.name: Death
13.practice: Cut away the dead; ritual endings and renewals

14.name: Art
14.practice: Middle pillar; integrate opposites to synthesis

15.name: The Devil
15.meaning: Form, fixation, and the power of definition
15.practice: Name attachments and unbind; reclaim definition

16.name: The Tower
16.practice: Initiate necessary collapse; rebuild on truth

17.name: The Star
17.meaning: Hope and silent guidance of the Night Sky
17.practice: Orient by your Star; nightly sky-gazing practice

18.name: The Moon
18.meaning: Initiation through the unknown and the astral
18.practice: Track dreams; walk the path with measured steps

19.name: The Sun
19.practice: Daily solar adorations; radiate without scorching

20.name: The Aeon
20.meaning: New formula; the child as crowned and conquering
20.practice: Proclaim the Word; anchor revelation in deeds

21.name: The Universe
21.meaning: Completion in manifestation; dance of Nuit
21.practice: Consecrate work to the world; begin anew

oath_of_abyss.text: I, [Magical Name], a member of the Body of God, do hereby bind myself on behalf of the Whole Universe, that I will lead a life of strict commitment to the Great Work, devoting every thought, word, and deed to the attainment of the Knowledge and Conversation of my Holy Guardian Angel, and to the performance of the True Will.
requirements: Surrender of all personal desires to the Will
Understanding of the Abyss as the gap between Ruach and Neshamah
Acceptance of being devoured by Choronzon
Rebirth as a Master of the Temple (8=3)

ordeals.ordeal_of_water: Dissolution of the ego in the waters of Binah
ordeals.ordeal_of_choronzon: Confrontation with the demon of dispersion
ordeals.ordeal_of_silence: The Great Silence of the Abyss
ordeals.ordeal_of_truth: Absolute honesty with the self and universe

philosophical_foundation.thelema: Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law
philosophical_foundation.love_law: Love is the law, love under will
philosophical_foundation.every_star: Every man and every woman is a star
